channel.title: How the. . . CLICK! C'Mon! Know you want to
channel.description: How does it not show the PW on Sources, but it shows it on TestScape, etc. Were can I change this? Is it even possible?

item.title: How the. . . CLICK! C'Mon! Know you want to
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

-.- This is what I need it for:
1- Seeing what NORMAL players have
2- If someone forgets their PW, I can help them

Yeah, really, I barely play Runescape… Im too … Nice, you know, Id feel bad if I were to hack someone, even if he had a Partyhat, dude… YEARS or MONTHS of work on that partyhat and it gets away, Id feel so bad, I WOULD NEVER HACK
